biotools.summary: Analyze many phenotypes compared to a single genetic variant (or other attribute). This method was originally described using electronic medical record (EMR) data from EMR-linked in the Vanderbilt DNA biobank, BioVU, but can also be applied to other richly phenotyped sets. ::DEVELOPER Biomedical Language Processing Lab.

bioschemas.name: PheWAS
